page.description: Returns true if the two strings are equivalent.
page.prototype: Result_Flag as L = STREQUAL(C String1, C String2 [,L IgnoreWhiteSpace = .f. [, L CaseSensitive = .f.]])

argument.name: String2
argument.description: A character string to compare to *[xb:String1]*.

argument.name: IgnoreWhiteSpace
argument.description: Default = .F.; .T. = Ignore white space characters when making the comparison, .F. = Do not ignore white space characters

argument.name: CaseSensitive
argument.description: Default = .F. .T. = Make a case-sensitive comparison, .F. = Make a case-insensitive comparison.

description.p: .T. = The strings match (are equal). .F. = The strings do not match.

page.discussion: The StrEqual() function compares the values contained in two character strings and returns .T. if they are equal, based on the selection of options.
page.example:
dim string1 as C dim string2 as C string1 = "Abc " string2 = "abc"
? strequal(string1, string2) = .F.
? strequal(string1, string2, .T.) = .T.
? strequal(string1, string2, .F., .T.) = .F.
? strequal(string1, string2, .T., .T.) = .F.
